duties_responsibilities.duty: Cultivate and enhance new and existing client relationships through active communication with clients, processing client requests, resolving inquiries, and providing guidance.
Identify and assist with firm services and solutions that support clients’ needs including banking products, digital offerings, and authentication of client requests.
Support the team’s marketing strategy by maintaining marketing materials, including digital and social media platforms, and planning client events and seminars.
Engage in available training and education programs to stay current on policies, procedures, and new platforms.

Perform administrative duties that support Financial Advisors in daily business practices, including telephone coverage, business travel arrangements, coordination of client meetings, and calendar maintenance.
Participate in firm initiatives directed by local management and seek opportunities to use firm resources for peer sharing and collaborating with Financial Advisors.

education_certification.credential: Willingness to obtain Series 7 (GS), and Series 66 (AG/RA) or Series 63 (AG) and Series 65 (RA)
